mapper.select: SELECT zm.zd_id, zc.customer_id, zc.supplier_id, zm.zaice_id, zc.employee_name, zc.city, zm.yuqi_yanglao_gongsi, zm.yuqi_yanglao_geren, zm.yuqi_jiben_yiliao_gongsi, zm.yuqi_jiben_yiliao_geren, zm.yuqi_dabing_yiliao_gongsi, zm.yuqi_dabing_yiliao_geren, zm.yuqi_shiye_gongsi, zm.yuqi_shiye_geren, zm.yuqi_gongshang_gongsi, zm.yuqi_shengyu_gongsi, zm.yuqi_gongjijin_gongsi, zm.yuqi_gongjijin_geren, zm.yuqi_qita_gongsi, zm.yuqi_qita_geren, zm.yuqi_canbaojin_gongsi, zm.yuqi_fuwufei, zm.shiji_yanglao_gongsi, zm.shiji_yanglao_geren, zm.shiji_jiben_yiliao_gongsi, zm.shiji_jiben_yiliao_geren, zm.shiji_dabing_yiliao_gongsi, zm.shiji_dabing_yiliao_geren, zm.shiji_shiye_gongsi, zm.shiji_shiye_geren, zm.shiji_gongshang_gongsi, zm.shiji_shengyu_gongsi, zm.shiji_gongjijin_gongsi, zm.shiji_gongjijin_geren, zm.shiji_qita_gongsi, zm.shiji_qita_geren, zm.shiji_canbaojin_gongsi, zm.shiji_fuwufei FROM zaice zc,zhangdan_mingxi zm WHERE zc.zc_id = zm.zaice_id AND zc.reporting_period = #{yearMonth} AND zc.supplier_id = #{supplierId}

SELECT zm.zd_id, zc.customer_id, zc.supplier_id, zm.zaice_id, zc.employee_name, zc.city, zm.yuqi_yanglao_gongsi, zm.yuqi_yanglao_geren, zm.yuqi_jiben_yiliao_gongsi, zm.yuqi_jiben_yiliao_geren, zm.yuqi_dabing_yiliao_gongsi, zm.yuqi_dabing_yiliao_geren, zm.yuqi_shiye_gongsi, zm.yuqi_shiye_geren, zm.yuqi_gongshang_gongsi, zm.yuqi_shengyu_gongsi, zm.yuqi_gongjijin_gongsi, zm.yuqi_gongjijin_geren, zm.yuqi_qita_gongsi, zm.yuqi_qita_geren, zm.yuqi_canbaojin_gongsi, zm.yuqi_fuwufei, zm.shiji_yanglao_gongsi, zm.shiji_yanglao_geren, zm.shiji_jiben_yiliao_gongsi, zm.shiji_jiben_yiliao_geren, zm.shiji_dabing_yiliao_gongsi, zm.shiji_dabing_yiliao_geren, zm.shiji_shiye_gongsi, zm.shiji_shiye_geren, zm.shiji_gongshang_gongsi, zm.shiji_shengyu_gongsi, zm.shiji_gongjijin_gongsi, zm.shiji_gongjijin_geren, zm.shiji_qita_gongsi, zm.shiji_qita_geren, zm.shiji_canbaojin_gongsi, zm.shiji_fuwufei FROM zaice zc,zhangdan_mingxi zm WHERE zc.zc_id = zm.zaice_id AND zc.reporting_period = #{yearMonth} AND zc.customer_id = #{customerId}
mapper.update: update zhangdan_mingxi set shiji_yanglao_gongsi=#{shijiYanglaoGongsi}, shiji_yanglao_geren=#{shijiYanglaoGeren}, shiji_jiben_yiliao_gongsi=#{shijiJibenYiliaoGongsi}, shiji_jiben_yiliao_geren=#{shijiJibenYiliaoGeren}, shiji_shiye_gongsi=#{shijiShiyeGongsi}, shiji_shiye_geren=#{shijiShiyeGeren}, shiji_gongshang_gongsi=#{shijiGongshangGongsi}, shiji_shengyu_gongsi=#{shijiShengyuGongsi} where zaice_id=#{zaiceId}
